name: Visual Studio Test Run Configuration File
summary: Learn about .TESTRUNCONFIG files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: Microsoft replaced the TESTRUNCONFIG file type with .TESTSETTINGS files in Visual Studio 2010.

description: Test settings file used by Microsoft Visual Studio 2008 and earlier; contains configuration information for running a suite of tests; used for defining the test parameters when running collections of test cases, such as unit tests.
